formal_name:
Hello Kitty Picnic
with Sanrio Friends
description:
Help Hello Kitty and Sanrio friends prepare for their picnic in the park in this fun collection of 10 mini-games! Collect all your picnic goodies and decorate five scenes including Hello Kitty’s bedroom, kitchen, and more.

Earn apple rewards to unlock new supercute outfits for Hello Kitty and special items you can use to decorate scene backgrounds.

Includes all your favorite Hello Kitty characters: Hello Kitty®, My Melody®, Keroppi®, Chococat®, Badtz-Maru®, Little Twin Stars®, and many more!

Follow voice narration and use the Touch Screen for all activities!
name:
Hello Kitty Picnic
with Sanrio Friends
disclaimer:
Due to the size of this game, it may take longer to download the digital version of this title when compared to other Nintendo eShop games. At the time of purchase you can choose either “Download Now” to begin to download the game immediately or “Download Later” to download the game when the system enters “sleep mode.”

You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
